pageSectionBy.title: Our Story
pageSectionBy.content:
We have been serving happy customers for 25 years from our office in Mushin, Lagos, Nigeria. Just as we have grown, we have also seen our customers grow. We want to be here much longer, so we only provide the best quality wood furniture materials so furniture you build lasts long.

Our retail store is merchandised with different variants of wood for furniture making. We stock plywood, flush doors, HDF and MDF to keep all makers making. In addition to our vast selection of wood, we are dealers for laminated, particle, marine boards and many others. We are your woodworking supply store.
